Package me.aecsocket.calibre.item.system

Interface CalibreSystem<D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - The descriptor type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AcceptsCalibrePlugin, CalibreIdentifiable, Cloneable, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.registry.Identifiable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MeleeSystem
    public interface CalibreSystem<D>
extends CalibreIdentifiable, Cloneable
    A system that can interact with a CalibreComponent through:
    • Running code on event calls (right click, hold, etc.)
    • Accepting custom data on deserialization
    • Providing stat definitions

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface me.aecsocket.calibre.item.CalibreIdentifiable
